title: PaigeIntro
body:
you: hey.. is this where i put the wine?

paige: um, yes, but the table is kind of full you might need to squeeze it on the edge.

you: oh.. okay, thanks.

paige: .....

paige: so are you having a drink or what???

[[no|nodrink]]
[[yes|yesdrink]]

title: nodrink
body: you: um, no thanks i'm okay.
